name: Vitale #1
description: Your 3.01 carat round brilliant cut natural diamond is a remarkable gemstone with specific attributes that contribute to its beauty and value. Its VVS1 clarity, very very small inclusions, is combined with a rare white  G colour, resulting in a captivating sparkle accentuated by a precise cut. Impeccably graded and crafted, this diamond promises timeless beauty and investment potential.
